list.name: Bulbasaur
list.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger

list.name: Ivysaur
list.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

list.name: Venusaur
list.description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

list.name: Charmander
list.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

list.name: Charmeleon
list.description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

list.name: Charizard
list.description: It spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. It may cause forest fires by blowing flames.

list.name: Squirtle
list.description: When it retracts its long neck into its shell, it squirts out water with vigorous force.

list.name: Wartortle
list.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

list.name: Blastoise
list.description: It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

list.name: Caterpie
list.description: For protection, it releases a horrible stench from the antenna on its head to drive away enemies.
